summary: 2006 jeep wrangler unlimited condition: good cylinders: 6 cylinders drive: 4wd fuel: gas odometer: 38,600 paint color: green title status: clean transmission: automatic type: offroad 2006 Jeep TJ Unlimited Rubicon LJ LJR Color: Jeep Green Miles: 38,600 Job change forces reluctant sale of this amazing and ultra rare LJ Rubicon. Includes onboard air, WARN bumpers and XD9000i winch, full Rubicon Express long arm kit with Rock Jock springs, and NIB Fox shocks! Frame and body/tub have ZERO rust. This rig has been a dedicated trail monster it's entire life by one previous owner in Durango Colorado... Body has tree stripes and there's some missing paint on the hardtop as shown. There are a few small dings, etc., but if you wanted to do paint correction it should clean up nicely. This is no poser mall crawler! It's an automatic, with 4:88 gears, running Jeep OEM 35” KO2 tires and 392 XR beadlock capable wheels that are in as new condition. Way too much to list, but has Rock Hard 4x4 bolt-in sport cage, hard and soft tops, hard top lift, NIB tube doors, ALL removed Rubicon bits (MOAB wheels, sliders, fenders), rare Insta-trunk, JW Speaker LED headlights, camo seat covers over perfect seats and beautiful carpet / interior, Bushwacker fenders, Curry Currectlync steering, ORO SwayLOC, and much more. Includes many spare parts, and a few summer projects like a ready to install upgraded factory rear view mirror with compass, temp, and courtesy lights. Was planning to finish all the projects and sorting by Spring to go wheeling but unfortunately I had to change jobs so I'm back to needing a daily driver. Please no tire kickers/time wasters, or low ball offers. Have your funds in order and ask permission first. :-) If you're not sure what you're looking at this Jeep is likely not for you. If the ad is up --- "yes" it's still available so no need to ask. Seriously for sale at $35k OBO. Thanks for looking!
imageUrl: 2006 Jeep LJ LJR TJ Unlimited Rubicon_item_9988_0.jpg

summary:  2014 bmw 328xi condition: excellent cylinders: 4 cylinders drive: fwd fuel: gas odometer: 79,000 paint color: white title status: clean transmission: automatic type: sedan I bought the car new and have garage kept it most its life, both at home and at work. I recently had a complete vehicle inspection performed to make sure she was ready for her next owner. My mechanic said it was in impressive condition and noted two maintenance items which I had done. The safety Inspection is good until Feb 2025. The engine runs great, maintenance records are available and the tires are relatively new. Great tread on All Season run flat tires. I just had new breaks and rotors installed along with the serpentine belt. (per the mechanics recommendation) I realize there may be some priced a little lower but believe this is the lowest priced like it with these features and miles. In addition to this being a 328 xi (or also known as the 328 i Xdrive) I also purchased a few upgrade packages listed below. Cold Weather Package: Heated Steering Wheel, Heated front & rear seats, retractable headlight washers. Lighting Package: Xenon headlights. Premium Package: Comfort Access keyless entry, moon-roof, lumbar support, Satellite radio*. Technology Package: Navigation system with touch-pad, heads-up display, BMW online, Advanced RTTI, remote services, BMW apps Enhanced B/T and smartphone.
